summary: Kamiya Tooru will focus on restoring physical needs, maintaining personal well-being with exercise, completing essential work tasks, and socializing with friends to start the new year energetically.
mood: Neutral with potential for improvement as basic needs are met.
priority_goals: Replenish basic needs of hunger and thirst.
Exercise to boost energy and health.

high_level_tasks.description: Begin the day by refreshing and having a nutritious breakfast to address hunger and thirst.
Engage in a morning exercise routine to increase stamina and overall health.
Concentrate on completing the essential work project to meet professional commitments.
Take time to relax and socialize with friends, either virtually or by going out.
Wind down for the evening with a light activity and dinner to ensure restfulness.
sub_tasks: PerformActivity (Read a Book or Watch TV)
